member.name: NMTCKEYDOWN
member.summary: Contains information about a key press in a tab control. It is used with the TCN_KEYDOWN notification code. This structure supersedes theTC_KEYDOWN structure.

member.name: NMTCKEYDOWN.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about the notification.

member.name: NMTCKEYDOWN.flags
member.summary: Value that is identical to thelParam parameter of the WM_KEYDOWN message.
